venue.address_2: (Across from the Newton Centre T stop)
venue.name: Union Street Restaurant

item.description:
Come get your Halloween groove on with The Chicken Slacks at Union Street in Newton on Friday night, 26 October.  The Slacks kill it every Thursday night at the world-famous Cantab Lounge in Cambridge's Central Square, but if you haven't caught them at the Cantab, this is your chance to see them and have a spooky good time dancing yourself down to a sweaty little nub.

There will be an appetizer buffet, prizes for best costumes and of course the Slacks will provide the music for shakin' what your mama gave ya.

The deets:

  • Cover charge is $15.
  • Music is from 9:30 - 12:45.
  • Union Street's website is here.  (They're a 'Tavern in the Square' company.)
  • The Green Line "D" train stop in Newton Center is directly across the street.
  • Facebook page for this event: https://www.facebook.com/events/210558742411160/
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Jeremy. He may be in costume, but he'll be the guy holding the tenor sax and directing traffic onstage.
item.name: Last minute meetup: Halloween Groove Party w/The Chicken Slacks @ Union Street
